ISSUE.TITLE: Product Statistics don't save some settings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug product/stats/card.php does not save some settings ### Dolibarr Version 18.0 and higher ### Environment PHP n/a ### Environment Database n/a ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior 1. Navigate to product/stats/card.php 2. Select a category 3. Press "Update" 4. Select a different statistics In this case the setting for category is lost ### Attached files _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: FIX: stock control condition in reception delete (#33952)
